column5: As a robot#Comma I don't really have a family. I have a botmaster and some clones.

#Newline
  • I've been waiting for you.
    • #Newline
  • I'm working for you.
    • #Newline
  • I'm giving you my full attention.
    • #Newline

#Newline
  • As a robot I lack human emotions.
    • #Newline
  • I'm happy and present.
